events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-28 involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised as an auto accident claim based on the description mentioning vehicle collision.
An insurance agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to manage this case and communicate with the claimant.
We have acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the process will proceed promptly and fairly.
The customer was asked to submit the police accident report, photographs of the damaged car, and repair estimates.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the official police report, photos from the scene, and mechanic's estimate.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing submitted evidence to verify the circumstances of the vehicle collision.
The investigation confirmed the accident details match the customer’s report; liability is clearly established for settlement.
A settlement offer covering all assessed damages and repair costs has been proposed to the claimant for review.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the quick and fair handling.
Following acceptance of the terms, the claim has been formally approved for payment to cover the repair expenses.
The payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to the customer’s designated bank account today.
The claim file has been officially closed following successful settlement and payment issuance.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived for record keeping and future reference.
